attributes.action: PUT THE ROAD TAX ON PETROL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ABOLISH TAX DISKS AND PUT ROAD TAX ON PETROL, THEN IF YOU USE THE ROADS YOU PAY THE TAX.
THEN IT WOULD MAKE PEOPLE THINK TWICE ABOUT THEIR JOURNEY'S.
AT THE MOMENT, BECAUSE THE ROAD TAX HAS GONE UP, I USE MY CAR A LOT MORE SO THAT I GET VALUE FOR THE ROAD TAX I AM PAYING, I DON'T PAY MY ROAD TAX FOR IT TO BE STUCK ON THE DRIVE, I THINK MANY PEOPLE ARE DOING THE SAME, SO INSTEAD OF MAKING PEOPLE" GREENER",  HE IS DOING THE EXACT OPPOSITE!!

rejection.details:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Steath/
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
